Hero.yourTrainingPartner: Smarter Workout Insights from Your Favorite Devices
Hero.description: Upload your Garmin, Apple Watch or Strava workouts and get smart, AI-generated insights. Track performance, recovery, and trends with your new digital training partner.

HumanoidSection.sportsScienceAccessible: We're making sports science accessible to every athlete
HumanoidSection.aiInsightsToWhereYouTrain: We're bringing AI insights to where you train
HumanoidSection.creatingTrainingPartners: We're creating training partners, not just data

SpecsSection.description: lominic works with your data, not against it. By analyzing heart rate zones, training load, recovery patterns, and learning from every workout, our AI helps athletes focus on what they do best: train smarter, recover better, and perform consistently.

DetailsSection.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your sport/activities,what kind of reports you are looking for, etc.
DetailsSection.validationError: Please fill in all required fields
DetailsSection.successMessage: Request submitted successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
DetailsSection.errorMessage: Failed to send request. Please try again.

ImageShowcaseSection.description: Our AI-powered platform transforms your workout data into actionable insights that help you train smarter and recover better.
ImageShowcaseSection.lominicAppInterfaceAlt: Lominic app interface showing AI training insights
ImageShowcaseSection.smartTrainingIntelligenceDescription: Built with advanced AI and sports science, our platform seamlessly analyzes your workouts from any device, providing personalized insights and recommendations to optimize your training.

Features.transformWorkoutData: Transform your workout data into actionable insights that help you train smarter and recover better.
Features.smartSummariesDescription: Get instant AI-generated summaries of every training session in plain language - no sports science degree required.
Features.askQuestionsDescription: Chat with your data! Ask 'Was this good for Zone 2?' or 'Did I overtrain this week?' and get intelligent answers.
Features.trackProgressDescription: Monitor weekly training load, heart rate trends, and improvement areas with intelligent analysis over time.
Features.compareWithFriendsDescription: Share progress and compare training insights with friends or training partners to stay motivated.
Features.recoveryInsightsDescription: Learn how to recover better and avoid overtraining with personalized recommendations based on your data.
Features.universalCompatibilityDescription: Works with Garmin, Apple Health, Strava, and any .FIT or .GPX file from your favorite fitness devices.

OptimizedFeatures.worksWithDevicesDescription: Seamlessly connect your Garmin, Apple Watch, or Strava account to automatically import workouts. Our platform supports all major fitness devices and file formats, so you can focus on training, not data management.
OptimizedFeatures.poweredByAITitle: Powered by AI, Built for Athletes
OptimizedFeatures.poweredByAIDescription: Our advanced AI analyzes your training patterns, heart rate zones, and recovery metrics to provide personalized insights. Get recommendations that adapt to your fitness level and training goals.
OptimizedFeatures.yourPrivacyDescription: Your workout data stays private and secure. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your personal information. You control what data you share and can delete it anytime.
OptimizedFeatures.seeYourTrendsTitle: See Your Trends, Not Just Numbers
OptimizedFeatures.seeYourTrendsDescription: Go beyond basic stats with intelligent trend analysis. Understand your training load, recovery patterns, and performance improvements over time with clear, actionable insights.

Testimonials.testimonial1Content: Lominic transformed my training by making complex data actually understandable. I finally know if I'm overtraining or if my recovery is on point.
Testimonials.testimonial2Content: As a cycling coach, I recommend this to all my athletes. The AI insights help them understand their training load and recovery needs better than any app I've seen.
Testimonials.testimonial3Content: The conversational AI is incredible. I can ask 'Was this a good Zone 2 session?' and get a detailed explanation that actually makes sense. Game changer for my training.
Testimonials.testimonial4Content: Finally, an app that doesn't just show me numbers but tells me what they mean. The weekly insights have helped me avoid overtraining and improve my performance.

Newsletter.newsletterDescription: Be first to hear about new features, training insights, and AI improvements
Newsletter.successMessage: Thank you for subscribing! You'll receive updates about Lominic soon.
Newsletter.errorMessage: Failed to subscribe. Please try again.

CTA.description: Join thousands of athletes who are already training smarter with AI-powered insights. Start free and upgrade to unlock advanced coaching and weekly reports.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Lominic. AI-powered training insights for athletes.

ContactUs.heroDescription: Have questions about Lominic? Want to share feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
ContactUs.reachUsDescription: We're here to help with any questions about Lominic, partnerships, or just to chat about training.
ContactUs.emailUsDescription: Send us a detailed message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
ContactUs.feedbackDescription: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or report any issues you've encountered.

ContactUs.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

ContactUs.whatIsLominicAnswer: Lominic is an AI-powered training intelligence platform that turns your wearable data into meaningful, actionable insights.
ContactUs.whichDevicesWorkAnswer: We support Garmin, Apple Watch, Strava, and other popular fitness platforms. More integrations coming soon.
ContactUs.howMuchDoesItCost: ðŸ’° How much does it cost?
ContactUs.howMuchDoesItCostAnswer: We offer a free plan and premium plans starting at $9.99/month. Check our pricing page for details.
ContactUs.isMyDataSafeAnswer: Absolutely. We never sell your data and use enterprise-grade security to protect your information.
ContactUs.wellGetBackToYouQuickly: We'll Get Back to You Quickly
ContactUs.responseTimeDescription: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours, often much sooner.
ContactUs.responseTimeDetail: We aim to respond within 24 hours
ContactUs.supportDetail: We're here when you need us
